question: Which of the following are the techniques for detection of cancer of internal organs?
(a) Radiography, MRI
(b) MRI, computed tomography
(c) Widal test, radiography
(d) MRI, widal test
explanation: Radiography, MRI (Magnetic Resonance Imaging), and CT (Computed Tomography) are used to detect cancers of internal organs. Widal test is for typhoid [cite: 132-140, 476].
